price: 66. Markaasay waayi xujooyin 23 maalintaas, waxnana isma weydiinayaan.
arabic: فَعَمِيَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡأَنۢبَآءُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ فَهُمۡ لَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
footnotes: 23. Si ay been u sheegaan ama u cudur daartaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: faʿamiyat ʿalayhimu al-anbāu yawma-idhin fahum lā yatasāalūna
